1.0.2.name: wordpress/pushmeto-widget
1.0.2.description: This is a sidebar widget for the Pushme.to service. If you have a Pushme.to account and would like to publish a Pushme.to widget on your Wordpress blog - this is the widget you need. If you don't have a pushme.to account, but do have an iPhone or iPod Touch, click here to open iTunes and download the app.
